thread.title: EastEnders' Bradley Branning looks totally unrecognisable now as Charlie Clements turns 29
thread.title_full: EastEnders' Bradley Branning looks totally unrecognisable now as Charlie Clements turns 29

author: Alistair McGeorge
title: EastEnders' Bradley Branning looks totally unrecognisable now as Charlie Clements turns 29
text:
EastEnders' Bradley Branning looks totally unrecognisable now as Charlie Clements nears 30 The soap star left Albert Square in a devastating death scene seven years ago Share Get soaps updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
EastEnders fans still remember Bradley Branning's upsetting death, as Stacey Slater's husband fell to his death seven years ago. 
Actor Charlie Clements left Albert Square back in 2010, and he's undergone an amazing transformation as he approaches his 30th birthday in June. 
The star has certainly changed a lot since his days on the soap, with a new selfie revealing that his redheaded locks and clean cut looks are gone in favour of a shaved head, black rimmed glasses and a rather impressive beard. Charlie Clements shared this selfie as he nears 30 (Photo: Twitter/Charlie Clements) He's changed a lot over the years (Photo: BBC) 
However, his style has changed even more drastically since then. He appeared as Bradley Branning until 2010 (Photo: BBC) 
"A year ago everyone was up in arms because I looked SO different at 28 to 18," he joked on Instagram. "Bet they didn't expect this at 29! #actor #chameleon" 
After leaving EastEnders - and earning the 'Best Exit' prizes at the British Soap and Inside Soap awards in the process - he has kept busy with his career on camera. He looked very different on Loose Women last year (Photo: Rex Features) He's kept busy (Photo: Rex Features) 
As well as a stint in Casualty as Jake O'Reilly in 2013, two years later he appeared in Murdoch Mystereries as Charlie Brackenreid. 
More recently, he has worked on drama Elizabeth And Her Enemies. Like us on Facebook
